name: Smile (Tucan444)
description:
This game is focused on player precission and logical thinking.

Very/maybe interesting story to discover.

I also aimed for a concept i havent seen yet soo theres something original, atleast i havent seen it anywhere so dont hate pls.

U will probably rage.

Created in pygame with my own engine and this is my first game so hope ull send feedback, thanks.

And if u read this theres one message at the end of the game, hmm im not 18. 

Thats all have fun!
